name: Pantagion
description: Pantagion is a turn-based strategy game where you take on the role of three scientists trapped in an isolated lab. The Ebola virus has just broken out, and it's up to you to determine their fate. Every turn, the infection spreads further through the base, putting your team in greater and greater peril. Craft temporary fixes to keep valuable rooms alive, or save up resources to cure the entire base. But watch out - the outcome of every level affects the start of the next!
